review: Dr Priya and Dr Subash were very friendly *** ********* ******** They listened patiently to all my queries and replied each one of them with explanations and consequences. I went there assuming I had lots of issues related to my gums and retainers but they assured me not to worry and I had no issues..so I only got scaling done as part of my regular routine  consultation. Thanks a lot for all your suggestions really appreciate it.
Great experience and Dr Prabha explained everything very properly. Not very pushy to get the treatment done. Gave Enough time to answer all my questions.

Doctor is very professional and experienced.She thoroughly explain the issue and advice correct treatment. I had a  pleasant experience visiting the clinic. Also behaviour of doctor is friendly. Must recommend from my side.
